articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Thanks to Participants in Grand Gymnastic and Artistic Performance "Arirang"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Thanks to Participants in Grand Gymnastic and Artistic Performance "Arirang"
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent thanks to the participants in the grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang", the winner of Kim Il Sung Prize.
					 It was given with splendor on the occasions of the 65th anniversary of the DPRK and the 60th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War. It fully demonstrated before the whole world the dignity and might of the Korean nation glorifying the revolutionary feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who devoted themselves to defending the country and achieving prosperity, and dynamically advancing toward a final victory under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea, and the development of the Juche-based culture and arts.
					
					 Through a perfect combination of music, dance, gymnastics, acrobats, ever-changing background, etc., the performers made a grand epic representation of the 100 year-long history of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's Korea which put the sovereignty and dignity of the country on the highest level and the period of prosperity in the era of Kim Jong Un which will shine forever, thus instilling great national pride and honor into all service personnel and people.
					
					 A meeting for conveying the thanks of Kim Jong Un took place at the May Day Stadium on Friday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned and the participants in the performance.
					
					 The thanks were conveyed by Kim Ki Nam.
					
					 Then followed speeches to renew pledges.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets AP Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets AP Delegation
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with the delegation of the Associated Press headed by President and CEO Gary Pruitt which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.
					 Present there were Kim Chang Gwang, director general of the KCNA, and officials concerned.

articles.title: Greetings to King of Lesotho
articles.content:
Greetings to King of Lesotho
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to Letsie III, king of Lesotho, on Friday on the occasion of the 47th anniversary of its  independence.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger. 
					
					 He sincerely wished the king good health and happiness and his country steady development and prosperity.

articles.title: NDC Policy Department Slams Park Geun Hye's Coarse Invectives against DPRK
articles.content:
NDC Policy Department Slams Park Geun Hye's Coarse Invectives against DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK released the following statement Friday:
					 It is the unquenchable desire of the nation and the irresistible trend of the times to achieve the reunification, peace and prosperity of the country as early as possible.
					
					 The bold measures taken by the army and people of the DPRK with patience and magnanimity to put the operations in the Kaesong Industrial Zone back on their normal track, realize the reunions of separated families and their relatives and resume the tour of Mt. Kumgang were the manifestation of their patriotic efforts to subordinate everything to meeting desire of the nation and the requirements of the times.
					
					 It was thanks to these efforts that the north-south relations that were inching close to a catastrophe due to traitor Lee Myung Bak were brought under control and the tense situation that reached the extremes began to ease.
					
					 Shortly ago, a new phase for dialogue and cooperation was provided amid deep concern and expectation of the public at home and abroad, bringing hope to all the Koreans.
					
					 But Park Geun Hye and the present ruling quarters of south Korea cried out for "confrontation accompanied with dialogue", not doing away with their dirty intention prompted by mistrust and hostility, thereby chilling the hard-won atmosphere of reconciliation and cooperation through bad words and acts and sinister steps.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group is trying to make the public convince that the measures taken by the DPRK on its own initiative to improve the north-south ties were taken "under the control" of a big country. The group said that the measures were an "unavoidable option to open back financial source and solve dire economic situation" and described them as "emergency measures under the situation in which the north was finding it hard to maintain its political system".
					
					 When the Kaesong Industrial Zone was put back on normal operations and a series of relevant agreements were reached, the group described them as results of the so-called "theory of principle" maintained by it.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK already warned the puppet south Korean authorities several times that they should stop anachronistic remarks against fellow countrymen and behave to give help to peace and reunification of the country if they do not want to see the north-south ties deteriorating as during the past five years.
					
					 But Park Geun Hye malignantly slandered the dignity and social system in the DPRK, now with her face raised, though she did it under the veil till some time ago. She openly slandered the DPRK soon after she took power.
					
					 So far, Park and her group often talked rubbish as if they were worried about the life and future of the north. They used to jabber that "the north should be led to abandon the line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force and properly opt the road of change", "the north should be made to understand that the former Soviet Union collapsed not because it did not possess nukes" and "strong deterrence should be built against the north to pressure it to dismantle nuclear weapons and missiles".
					
					 Recently the group held an event to mark "Day of ROK Army" miming the great political festival for celebrating the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War that was held in the DPRK amid admiration of the world. The group is blustering that it will use the "south Korea-U.S. combined operational system", "Kill Chain preemptive strike system" and the "south Korean-type missile defense system", threadbare ones, to make the north admit the uselessness of nuclear weapons and missiles by itself. 
					
					 Park and her group, steeped in repugnance against the DPRK to the marrow of their bones, made coarse outpourings, daring take issue with the autographic letters sent to people reflecting loving care and trust.
					
					 The group made up lies, not content with slandering the single-mined unity characterized by pure kindred feelings between parents and children. The group is, indeed, made up of ignorant hooligans hell-bent on hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and on eclipsing the bright sunlight.
					
					 Park's disgusting acts leave even young pupils of primary schools of the DPRK skeptical about her ability as president as they say "it seems there is no appropriate person in south Korea. Is it possible for a person making bad words to become president?" Servicepersons of the DPRK ridicule that "does Park, who is unaware of the basics of the military affairs, know the meaning of the DPRK's nukes that have become smaller, lighter and diversified."
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are watching with dubious eyes how Park is maintaining her post in Chongwadae as she is rejected as a "stubborn woman" shunning the mindset of the people, a narrow-minded "headstrong lady" going against the national concord and a "cold-blooded being" defying the good faith of compatriots.
					
					 The Policy Department of the DPRK NDC sternly warns Park and her group as follows now that the hard-won atmosphere of dialogue and peace is turning into that of confrontation and tension on the Korean Peninsula:
					
					1. Park should open her mouth to suit her capacity, clearly judging how the things go about in the world if she truly ranks among politicians. 
					
					 A saying goes that all misfortunes come from mouth and that all illnesses also go through the mouth. 
					
					 She should refrain from groundlessly insisting on the false "principle" and pressing her unilateral and self-justified opinion as an "international standard". She should be mindful that thoughtless vitriolic languages may cause the shower of fire by the army and people of the DPRK. It is said that tongue wagged thoughtlessly will become a knife cutting one's own head. A politician who hails from this land should make words helpful for the country's reunification, peace and prosperity. She should bear in her mind that in case she does not do so, she can not evade the same miserable ends as the "yusin" dictator and other puppet presidents met.
					
					2. Park and her group should face up to the desire of the nation and the trend of the times and behave with discretion.  
					
					 What the nation wants is reconciliation and cooperation and the times call for peace and reunification. 
					
					 If she wants to live as a genuine human being who puts the nation above all and attaches importance to it, she should stop treacherous act of antagonizing the fellow countrymen and kissing the aggressors in alignment with outsiders. 
					
					 Her reckless act of betraying the nation and going against the times will push her deep into treachery which is bound to be punished by history. She should not forget that it is an unpardonable act of treachery to introduce carrier flotilla with nuclear weapons on board and the aggressors' nuclear strike means into south Korea to threaten the fellow countrymen and to instigate human scum to scatter leaflets and hold other anti-DPRK psychological warfare almost every day.
					
					3. Park and her group should not try to lead the DPRK to "change" and force it to dismantle nuclear weapons.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will invariably advance forward its own way, under the line on simultaneously pushing forward the building of nuclear force and economic construction to build a prosperous country to be envied by the world, to attain the goals set by them. 
					
					 What needs change is Park's politics which are veering to "yusin" and dictatorship after derailing from the road of democracy. 
					
					 The nuclear weapons possessed by the army and people of the DPRK are a powerful deterrence to deter the nuclear war disaster to be inflicted by the U.S., and a treasured sword common to the nation to defend the destiny of the country and its people. 
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear weapons serve as the most appropriate means for peace. They will play the role of completely removing the sustainable nuclear threats from the U.S. and linking the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula with that of the world.
					
					 There will be no bigger fool and poorer imbecile than the one who schemes to side with nuclear-wielding robber and urge one's own kinsmen to lower a knife first. 
					
					 If Park and her group conspire with outsiders under the pretext of leading the DPRK to "change" and go reckless to bring down the social system in the DPRK and force it to dismantle nuclear weapons, it will be little short of digging their own graves. 
					
					 Those who went against the desire of the nation and the trend of the times all met miserable ends.
					
					 Park and her group should not run reckless, clearly facing up to the trend of the times.

articles.title: DPRK Olympic Committee Delegation Leaves for China
articles.content:
DPRK Olympic Committee Delegation Leaves for China
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Olympic Committee headed by Chairman Ri Jong Mu, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, left here Friday by air to attend the 6th East Asian Games to be held in Tianjin, China.

articles.title: AP Delegation Tours Different Parts of Pyongyang
articles.content:
AP Delegation Tours Different Parts of Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Associated Press headed by President and CEO Gary Pruitt visited the Tower of the Juche Idea.
					 Being briefed on the grand monument to the ideological and theoretical exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by founding the Juche idea, members of the delegation was deeply impressed to go round the tower, groups of sculptures and stones sent by many countries.
					
					 They commanded a bird's-eye view of the marvelously changed city of Pyongyang from the observation deck of the tower.
					
					 They also visited the Mansudae Art Studio.

articles.title: Military Attache of Egyptian Embassy Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Military Attache of Egyptian Embassy Hosts Reception 
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Yasser Hussein Taha Aboelfadl, military attache of the Egyptian embassy here, hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Friday on the Day of the Egyptian Army. 
					 Present there on invitation were Colonel General O Kum Chol and other generals and officers of the Korean People's Army, officials concerned, foreign diplomatic envoys and military attaches of various embassies here. 
					
					 Iman Mostafa Abdou Ahmed, Egyptian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy were present there.

articles.title: Inter-governmental Protocols between DPRK and Russia Inked
articles.content:
Inter-governmental Protocols between DPRK and Russia Inked
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The protocols of the 18th meeting of the forestry sub-committee of the inter-governmental committee for cooperation in trade, economy, science and technology between the DPRK and Russia were inked here Friday.
					 Present at the signing ceremony were Kim Yong Jin, vice-chairman from the DPRK side of the sub-committee to the committee, and officials concerned and members of the delegation of the forestry sub-committee from the Russian side to the committee headed by Vice-Chairman Valery Prilipov.
					
					 The protocols were signed by Kim Yong Jin and Valery Prilipov.

articles.title: More Sportspersons Move to New Flats
articles.content:
More Sportspersons Move to New Flats
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Sportspersons' families moved everyday to new flats built on the bank of the River Pothong.
					 On Friday, too, more sportspersons' families moved to new flats.
					
					 Happy laughter was heard from deluxe new flats into which sportspersons and their families moved.
					
					 Kim Kum Ok, player of the April 25 Sports Team, said supreme leader Kim Jong Un has shown so profound loving care and trust that  she is moved to tears. She went on: Words fail to describe this honor and happiness as the party provided this new flat to her before any others after projecting her as a model of sportspersons in the new era and a praiseworthy daughter of the nation though she did what she was obliged to do. I could hardly enter the flat as every room of the wonderful flat is associated with the profound loving care of the Marshal and I was deeply touched by the benevolence under the grateful socialist system. I keenly realized once again under what profound loving care we are living.
					
					 Om Yun Chol, player of the Amnokgang Sports Team, said with tears of emotion, feeling grateful to the mother party for bringing such happy event: We sportspersons could exalt the dignity and honor of Songun Korea with gold medals in international games thanks to the deep loving care of Kim Jong Un who has always led us in each match, instilling strength and courage into us. We deeply feel honored and proud of being sportspersons in the era of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 An Kum Ae and Kim Un Guk, players of the April 25 Sports Team, and Pak Kyong Ok, player of Kumgangsan Sports Team, also expressed their excited feelings. They said no persons are as blessed with everything as them in whom Kim Jong Un reposed so deep trust, saying the sportspersons who had the flag of the Republic hoisted in the international games are genuine patriots, heroes and smart persons.
					
					 Kim Il Song, chief coach of the April 25 Sports Team, and Ri Chun Gyong, coach of the Amnokgang Sports Team, vowed to train many more successful players by devoting all their wisdom and enthusiasm, aware of their mission as pace-setters of the party for building a sports power and thus contribute to demonstrating the dignity of the DPRK before the whole world.

articles.title: Art Performance Given by Schoolchildren
articles.content:
Art Performance Given by Schoolchildren
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- An art performance was given by the art group members of the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace Friday to mark the 16th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 68th anniversary of the WPK.
					 The performance raised its curtain with prologue "Tribute to the Generalissimo Who Founded the Workers' Party." 
					
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as orchestral music for piano "The General Star beyond the Clouds," duet dance "Accordion Sent with Loving Care" and national instrumental music and song "He Is Always with Us." 
					
					 The performers enthusiastically sang of the immensely rosy future of the country led by Marshal Kim Jong Un who is carrying forward President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il's noble idea of love for the younger generation. 
					
					 Among the audience were officials concerned and those of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and schoolchildren in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Third Quarter Plan Fulfilled at Economic Units of DPRK
articles.content:
Third Quarter Plan Fulfilled at Economic Units of DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Many economic units in the DPRK have overfulfilled their plans for the third quarter of the year.
					 The machine industrial section carried out its assignment at 119.3 percent.
					
					 The Taean Heavy Machine Complex supplied many ordered apparatuses to different economic fields, including power stations under construction and the Pukchang Thermal Power Complex, overfulfilling its quarter plan by 4.1 percent.
					
					 The Rakwon Machine Complex and the Ryongsong Machine Complex finished their assignments at 118.7 percent and 104.9 percent respectively by giving precedence to the supply of materials and raising the operation rate of equipment.
					
					 The electrical machinery industrial section carried out its plan at 134.3 percent while the rolling stock and machine-tool industrial sections fulfilled their assignments at 154.5 and 106.2 percent respectively.
					
					 The Musan Mining Complex and the Songyo Knitted Goods Factory overfulfilled their quarter plans by 0.3 and 10.3 percent.

articles.title: Premier Soccer League under Way in DPRK
articles.content:
Premier Soccer League under Way in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Division-1 men and women's football matches for DPRK Championships began in Pyongyang on Oct. 1.
					 The championships include 30-odd sports events, including basketball, volleyball, ping-pong, weightlifting, wrestling and archery, whose competitions take place in the capital city of Pyongyang and provinces.
					
					 The division-1 football matches are underway on a round-robin basis.
					
					 In Thursday football match at Kim Il Sung Stadium, Kigwancha Team beat Rimyongsu Team 1:0 in the men's event. In women's event Amnokgang Team defeated Pyongyang Team 3:0 and Wolmido Team beat Ponghwasan Team 1:0.

articles.title: AFC "C" License Award Coaching Course in DPRK
articles.content:
AFC "C" License Award Coaching Course in DPRK
Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The AFC (Asian Football Confederation) "C" license award coaching course was recently held in Wonsan City, Kangwon Province of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Attending it were 20-odd coaches of sports teams and football instructors of city and county juvenile sports schools in the province.
					
					 The course, divided into theoretical and practical sections, was officiated by Kim Yong Gil, a lecturer of the AFC.
					
					Theoretical section dealt with such matters as the features of physical growth of juveniles, training guidance process and contents, requirements for training guidance, and understanding of tactics.
					
					 The practical section focused on problems arising in putting the training guidance of coaches and instructors on a scientific basis, such as dribbling, shooting, and one to one and two to two defense. 
					
					 Earlier, in April and June there were similar courses in Pyongyang and Ryanggang Province.

articles.title: History of Changsong County Turned into Well-off Locality (5)
articles.content:
History of Changsong County Turned into Well-off Locality (5)
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, is now making tireless efforts to glorify the undying feats the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed in turning Changsong County into a well-off locality. 
					 He urged all counties in the country to develop the local economy on a higher level and further improve the people's living standard as required by the new century.
					
					 With the 50th anniversary of the Changsong Joint Conference as an occasion, he took all measures to build up Changsong County as a model of local economic development.
					
					 In August Juche 101 (2012) he made public a work "Let Us Build All Counties into People's Paradise Good to Live in by Embodying Spirit of Historic Changsong Joint Conference". The work indicates the tasks and ways for glorifying the feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il forever and strengthening the counties and enhancing their role in keeping with the requirements of the new century.
					
					 In June this year he toured various parts of Changsong County, saying that the county associated with devoted efforts of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il should lead the whole country in developing the local economy. He called upon the county to take the lead in production of processed wild fruits.
					
					 Visiting the Changsong Foodstuff Factory, he noted with high appreciation that its products are as good as those produced at central factories.
					
					 At Changsong Restaurant and Changsong Noodle House he told that everything should be done to win favor of inhabitants and it is the standard of any work to meet their demand and interests.
					
					 He also toured the Undok Health Complex under construction, saying that he attached importance to it and that Changsong County should be a good model in every aspect for the whole country to follow.
					
					 Under his deep care, greater changes are being made in Changsong County with each passing day. 
					
					　The feats performed by the peerlessly great men for the county's development will remain long in the history of the country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Implementing North-South Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Implementing North-South Joint Declaration
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The historic October 4 declaration is a precious fruition of the patriotic devotion and efforts made by leader Kim Jong Il who dedicated his all to the work for bringing a reunified and prosperous country to the compatriots, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an editorial dedicated to the 6th anniversary of the publication of the declaration.
					 The past 6 years since the adoption of the declaration were a period characterized by the strenuous struggle waged by the Korean people to defend and implement the north-south declarations, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 The present puppet conservative authorities of south Korea have desperately worked to escalate confrontation with compatriots while paying lip-service to "dialogue" and "confidence".
					
					 One can hardly expect detente on the Korean Peninsula and improved inter-Korean relations without respecting and implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration. This is the lesson drawn by the Koreans again from the past 6 years.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north, south and overseas should turn out as one in the just patriotic struggle to meet the blatant challenge of the anti-reunification forces and to achieve the development of inter-Korean relations, peace on the Korean Peninsula and co-prosperity of the nation by their concerted efforts.
					
					 The DPRK wishes to improve the inter-Korean relations and  makes positive efforts to do so but it will never tolerate but strongly react to any politically-motivated military provocations of  the south Korean puppet forces to hurt its dignity and social system, chill the atmosphere of dialogue and negotiations and escalate tension on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It is necessary to boost solidarity and alliance among Koreans in the north, south and overseas and wage a nation-wide movement for national reunification.
					
					 The struggle of the Korean nation for carving out its independent destiny is by no means a smooth sailing but no force on earth can stem the dynamic trend of times toward independent reunification and peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Bolstering up Army
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Bolstering up Army
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- It is an important requirement for accomplishing the socialist cause to bolster up the army, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 What tragic consequences are to be caused if a revolutionary army is allowed to be weak and waver. This is clearly proved by the war history and the development and changing course of the socialist movement in the last century.
					
					 A revolutionary army, in particular, should become the army of the leader and the party.
					
					 If a people tightly hold arms, they are sure to emerge victorious. This is clearly proved by the practical experience of the DPRK.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il steered the Korean revolution along the glorious road of victory, weathering the stern trial and storms of history with his original Songun revolutionary leadership guided by the idea of giving importance to the army in the 90s of the 20th century when the world socialist movement was at peril and the imperialists became evermore desperate in their moves against socialism and the DPRK.
					
					 The might and advantages of Songun displayed in the DPRK instilled strength and courage into the world socialist movement and the anti-imperialist independent forces which had been daunted in confusion. As a result, the movement for independence tided over its crisis worldwide and came to advance on the orbit of fresh development.
					
					 Different anti-imperialist independent countries keenly realized the might, validity and vitality of Songun politics enforced by Kim Jong Il and are going in the direction of enforcing the policy of attaching importance to military affairs and bolstering up defence capabilities. 
					
					 World progressive countries and peoples are standing up against the high-handed and arbitrary practices and hegemony of the imperialist forces and aspiring after independence and socialism, inspired by the might of the DPRK which has protected its sovereignty and advanced thanks to the idea of giving importance to arms and Songun politics.
					
					 The serious historic lesson taught by the history of the  world socialist movement and the practical experience of the Korean revolution go to prove that Songun politics serves as an all-powerful treasured sword guaranteeing victory not only  today but in the future.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Raps S. Korean Chief Executive's Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Raps S. Korean Chief Executive's Reckless Remarks
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean chief executive appeared in a series of events held to mark the 60th anniversary of the puppet army of south Korea and alliance with the U.S. In her "commemoration speech" malignantly slandering the DPRK, she termed its bolstering up of nuclear force "illusion". She went the lengths of jabbering that "the north will come to understand itself that nukes and missiles are no longer useful."  She made no scruple of letting loose very insolent and reckless remarks that "reform and opening are the only way of existence" and "the south will build powerful deterrence to cope with the north till it dismantles its nuclear weapons and will lead it to the path of change." 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a commentary in this regard: 
					
					 The south Korean chief executive personally incited confrontation with fellow countrymen at a time when the north-south relations are driven into a crisis. This is an outright challenge to the aspiration of the nation and demand of the times and a vicious provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 Recently her yes men like Kim Kwan Jin, Ryu Kil Jae and Yun Pyong Se vied with each other to take issue with the line of the DPRK and malignantly slander it over its nuclear issue almost every day. This was deliberate mud-slinging made under her backstage wire-pulling and according to her scenario of confrontation. 
					
					 What she uttered about the nuclear issue, ballyhooing about "illusion" and "understanding", is a revelation of her sinister intention to shift the responsibility for the escalated tension on the Korean Peninsula onto the DPRK and disarm it in collusion with outside forces.
					
					 If she regards the north as a target of confrontation, not a dialogue partner, she will bring only disastrous consequences. Only fools behave so carelessly, calculating they can do anything, though bereft of any elementary ability to judge things.
					
					 The south Korean chief executive would be well advised to behave herself if she does not wish to meet the same miserable end as that of traitor Lee Myung Bak.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses Japan of Mocking at International Community
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses Japan of Mocking at International Community 
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- With no rhetoric can Japan conceal the hypocritical and reactionary nature of "active pacifist policy" touted by it, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 It goes on: Some days ago the prime minister of Japan said in his public appearance that "Japan will more actively engage than before to ensure global peace, stability and prosperity from "the active pacifist stand".
					
					 The chief Cabinet secretary, the foreign minister and the minister of defence of Japan also asserted that Tokyo would discuss "national security strategy" on the principle of "active pacifism" and this should be included in the new defence program guidelines.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are mocking at the international community under the signboard of "peace".
					
					 Japan has seriously infringed upon the sovereignties of other countries but no country has ever invaded or threatened Japan.
					
					  The much fuss made by Japan exaggerating realities is aimed at misrepresenting the situation and using it for the ulterior goal.
					
					 "Active pacifism" on the lips of the Japanese reactionaries is another version of the theory of active overseas aggression.
					
					 The Japan "Self-Defense Forces" have grown to be offensive forces for aggression, going far beyond their mission.
					
					 Unimaginable will be consequences if the Japanese reactionaries hurl their aggressor forces into overseas aggression under the signboard of "peace" in a bid to repeat their crime-woven past history.
					
					 Global peace and security will be put in danger and the international community be seriously disturbed.

articles.title: S. Korean War-like Elements' Move to Unleash New War Assailed by Minju Joson
articles.content:
S. Korean War-like Elements' Move to Unleash New War Assailed by Minju Joson
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet regime held an event to mark "Day of ROK Army" on Tuesday.
					 Led by warplanes, missile-mounted vehicles, tanks and armored cars, more than 11 000 troops of the south Korean puppet army filed past before the present ruling conservative forces of south Korea and top officials of the U.S. military.
					
					 The puppet regime said that the event reaffirmed the alliance with the U.S. and it was the largest function in a decade, blustering about the capability of coping with the asymmetric armed forces of the north and precision attacks on the core facilities in all parts of the north.
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson says on Friday as follows:
					
					 Such an event as the celebration of the "Day of ROK Army" held by the puppet regime is a farce to provoke a new war on the Korean Peninsula in collaboration with foreign forces.
					
					 It is illogical that the regime held such a function.
					
					 What is more serious is that the south Korean chief executive called for building up strong deterrents to the north's nuclear weapons at the event. The remarks can never be pardoned as they are an undisguised challenge to the DPRK's efforts for dialogue and peace and the improvement of the relations with the south.
					
					 The regime's taking issue with the DPRK over "nuclear weapons" is part of the moves which it has pursued with the U.S. to disarm the DPRK and easily realize the ambition of invasion. 
					
					 It also seeks such a crafty intention to divert elsewhere the public criticism of its criminal acts which spoiled the atmosphere of warming the inter-Korean ties, which was created with much effort thanks to the DPRK's initiatives and sincere efforts, through confrontation with the DPRK, and thus tide over its worst ruling crisis.
					
					 We warn the south Korean puppet regime that if it continues escalating the confrontation with compatriots in league with the U.S. as it does now, everything will end up in ruin.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Can Never Stamp out Vitality of October 4 Declaration: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Can Never Stamp out Vitality of October 4 Declaration: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 6th anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 The declaration, which serves as a programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration, ushered in a great heyday of national reconciliation and unity unprecedented in the history of the movement for national reunification under the banner of "By our nation itself".
					
					 All Koreans still remember the days when multi-channel contacts and dialogue and multi-faceted cooperation undertakings were brisk between the north and the south and they were full of confidence and desire for reunification and peace and prosperity thanks to the implementation of the October 4 declaration.
					
					 However, their desire for the country's reunification and improved inter-Korean relations has now faced a stumbling block.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group is now desperately kicking up a confrontation racket against the DPRK while openly negating the above-said declarations.
					
					 The present ruling forces of south Korea made public on Sept. 25 what they called the second "principal plan for the development of south-north relations", the one which officially abrogated the October 4 declaration.
					
					 As regards this development, media and people in south Korea are expressing serious concern, saying that the "government has officially inflicted death sentence upon the plans for creating a special zone for peace and cooperation in the West Sea and promoting the building of a peace mechanism specified in the declaration, a product of the south-north summit, as its key points.
					
					 Even the Lee Myung Bak puppet regime dared not find fault with the October 4 declaration. Nevertheless, the present south Korean regime has taken such action as officially scrapping the declaration. This cannot but be a thrice-cursed action of stamping out the greatest programme for national reunification.
					
					 Lurking behind its plan is what it called "theory of principle" based on "the confidence-building process on the Korean Peninsula".
					
					 When various undertakings were put on the orbit of step-by-step settlement between the north and the south recently thanks to the magnanimity and efforts of the DPRK, the puppet group came out with the "theory of principle" aimed at "changing the regime", derailing dialogue.
					
					 The "theory" is nothing but the one of confrontation as it totally negates the three principles of national reunification, the basic principle and ideal of the inter-Korean relations, and the idea of "By our nation itself" clarified in the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 Negation of the above-said declarations is bound to lead to confrontation and war. This is a bitter lesson drawn by the Koreans from the history of the past 6 years.
					
					 The key to settling the issue of the extremely bedeviled inter-Korean relations lies in implementing the declarations fully hailed and supported by all Koreans, to begin with.
					
					 Therefore, the struggle for implementing the declarations is a do-or-die battle against the group of traitors which has desperately pursued confrontation with compatriots, deliberately laying a stumbling block in the way of reunification.
					
					 With no rhetoric can the group of traitors stamp out the vitality of the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Assails Japan for Its Shameless Outbursts
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Assails Japan for Its Shameless Outbursts
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- The Japanese chief executive, speaking at the 68th UN General Assembly, cried out for "prevention of sexual violence and material and moral aid to those victims", claiming that "there can be no normalization of Japan-DPRK relations without the settlement of the abduction issue."
					 This is a cynical ploy to cover up the despicable true colors of Japan as the arch criminal which perpetrated so many abduction cases and enforced sexual slavery and evade the responsibility for redeeming its crime-woven past.
					
					 By origin, Japan is a criminal state which is not entitled to talk about "abduction" and "sexual violence".
					
					 It committed a great many hideous war crimes by invading Asian countries in the last century. 
					
					 Abduction and sexual slavery are the most cruel and hideous crimes committed by Japan against humanity.
					
					 Japan took away more than 8.4 million innocent young and middle-aged Koreans as cannon fodder for a war of aggression and forced them to do slave labor. It, at the same time, forced 200 000 Korean women into sexual slavery for its aggressor troops, committing all sorts of sordid atrocities which made even brutes blush.
					
					 The crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past are unheard-of monstrous crimes for which Japan should pay a thousand times.
					
					 Had Japan been a country with good reason, it should have knelt down before the international community and admitted and made apology and reparation for its past crimes and thus turned over a new leaf.
					
					 However, the Japanese reactionaries have persistently denied its past crimes for the purpose of realizing their ambition for reinvasion which they have failed to do so far and are now working hard to make their shameless acts a policy.
					
					 Such despicable acts as putting the abductions perpetrated in the past into the shade are rampant in Japan where society is veering to the Right and moves are stepped up to turn it into a military giant.
					
					 Not content with committing "flesh traffic" in different parts of the world, the Japanese right-wing gangsters are unhesitatingly luring and abducting citizens of the DPRK. The appearance of Japan as a criminal state against humanity remains unchanged.
					
					 Such being a hard fact, Japan is becoming talkative about "abduction" and "sexual violence." This is an unpardonable mockery and challenge to justice and human conscience.
					
					 Japan is sadly mistaken if it thinks it can  quell the voices of the DPRK and the international community urging the former to liquidate its past crimes by vociferating about "the issue of abduction".
					
					 The world is denouncing the Japanese chief executive's reckless remarks as "self-contradictory ones" and "outbursts to divert elsewhere the focus of the settlement of Japan's past crimes".
					
					 Japan would be well advised to lend an ear to the world public criticism and refrain from making disgusting remarks such as "the issue of abduction" and "the rights of women".
					
					 It should bear in mind that its liquidation of the past is essential for the DPRK-Japan relations and make a prompt and honest apology and reparation for all its past crimes including the sexual slavery.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Assailed for Deceiving People through False Commitments
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Assailed for Deceiving People through False Commitments
						
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Different organizations of south Korea held a joint press conference at the Kwanghwamun plaza in Seoul on Tuesday denouncing the puppet group for its hypocritical acts.
					 Speeches were made at the press conference.
					
					 Sin Sung Chol, chairman of the Confederation of Trade Unions, accused the chief executive of reneging on her election commitments one by one after taking office.
					
					 Jong Yong Gon, executive chairman of the People's Action for Setting Right the People's Pension, chided the chief executive who visited old persons during the election campaign, saying she would pay "pension for old persons," but broke her promise after she was elected.
					
					 In Thae Yon, co-representative of the Headquarters of the Movement for Economic Democratization, deplored that self-supporting persons are living in a veritable hell every day but the "president" broke the promise she made in markets, pushing them to cliff of death.
					
					 Mun Ki Ju, chairman of a branch of the Ssangyong Motors Trade Union, said Park Geun Hye who promised a state investigation into the incident of Ssangyong Motors should prevent workers from meeting grievous deaths and alleviate the bitter sufferings of the discharged workers as soon as possible.
					
					 Jo Song Dok, branch head of the Public Transport Trade Union, accusing the chief executive of reneging on her commitment to turn part-time job in the field of public service into a regular job, urged her to fulfill her commitment or step down.
					
					 Kim Jong Hun, chairman of the Teachers Union, said the chief executive made four commitments as regards education. If she does not fulfill them, she will meet the same miserable end as that of her preceding dictator, Kim warned.
					
					 Pak Sok Un, co-representative of the People's Strength for Building New World, and Jong Hyon Baek, co-representative of the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society, accused the present regime of making false commitments and telling lies, urging it to take immediate measures.
					
					 Then a press release was read out.
					
					 It denounced the present regime for deceiving the people through false commitments.
					
					 If it does not keep the promise made to the people, it will face all-people resistance, it warned.

articles.title: Koreans in Uzbekistan Mark Important Anniversaries
articles.content:
Koreans in Uzbekistan Mark Important Anniversaries
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Uzbekistan held an event on Oct. 1 in commemoration of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 6th anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					 Present there were Chairman Ju Yong Il and Vice-Chairman Ko Tae Chun of the "Old Men" Association for Korean Cultural Tradition in Uzbekistan, heads of Korean art troupes and Koreans in Uzbekistan.
					
					 Ju Yong Il said in his speech the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung has developed into a genuine party serving the people, invariably preserving its revolutionary character, and a revolutionary party steering the revolution and construction to victory under the seasoned guidance of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It always shapes policies reflecting the will of the people and translates its ideas into reality in trial and adversity, he noted.
					
					 The shortcut to national reunification lies in implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration agreed upon by the north and the south, he said, calling upon all overseas Koreans to work harder to contribute to national reunification and the building of a thriving nation, keeping pace with the dynamic advance of the people in the homeland under the banner of the historic north-south joint declarations. 
					
					 Then followed an art performance given by Korean artistes in Uzbekistan.

articles.title: Work of Kim Jong Un Published in South Africa
articles.content:
Work of Kim Jong Un Published in South Africa
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" was published in booklet by the Pretoria Copy Master Publishing House of South Africa on September 26.
					 The work, made public on July 26, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the essence of leader Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his whole life characterized by his noble love for the country and its people.
					
					 It also clarifies important issues arising in embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Political Party Leader of Benin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Political Party Leader of Benin
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, paid high tribute to leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The president said in his statement issued on September 24 that Kim Jong Il performed great exploits by leading the WPK for decades.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 It was the distinguished feat performed by Kim Jong Il in the party building that he led the WPK to consistently adhere to the revolutionary principles.
					
					 Kim Jong Il led the WPK to steadfastly advance along the road of socialism without the slightest vacillation late in the last century when the DPRK faced the worst trial.
					
					 He formulated the unique Songun politics as a main political mode under socialism and thoroughly embodied it, protecting the sovereignty and dignity of the country and socialism and making a great contribution to the global peace and security.
					
					 He developed the WPK into an invincible party which deeply rooted among the masses and the mother party which achieved a harmonious whole with the people.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un made sure that Kim Jong Il was held in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the WPK and clarified his firm will to carry forward and accomplish the idea and cause of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 I hope that the WPK and the Korean people will achieve greater successes in their struggles for building an economic power and defending the peace and security of the country under the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Meeting for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Britain
articles.content:
Meeting for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Britain
 Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- A meeting for solidarity with the Korean people took place outside the embassy premise of south Korea in London on September 26.
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, in his speech accused the south Korean authorities of inflicting a heavy penalty upon Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, and brutally suppressing the pro-reunification patriotic forces after fabricating a conspiratorial case of attempted rebellion recently.
					
					 They are chilling the hard-won atmosphere of dialogue and kicking up a whirlwind of fascist crackdown through a malignant smear campaign against the DPRK and madcap confrontation racket against compatriots, he noted, adding;
					
					 "The theory of principle" touted by them is nothing but an anti-reunification theory of confrontation with fellow countrymen and a treacherous and sycophantic theory of toeing the U.S. policy for stifling the DPRK from A to Z.
					
					 The world progressives are strongly urging them to stop their suppression of the pro-reunification patriotic forces.
					
					 With no rhetoric can they justify their moves to escalate the confrontation with compatriots.
					
					 The U.S. troops in south Korea are the source of all misfortunes of the Korean people.
					
					 The U.S. should pull all its forces of aggression out of south Korea as early as possible and stop interfering in the Korean issues.
					
					 Present at the meeting were figures of the New Communist Party of Britain, the Association for the Study of Songun Politics, the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Friendship Society with Korea, and masses.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia nota de agradecimiento a participantes en funcion "Arirang"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia nota de agradecimiento a participantes en funcion "Arirang"  
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio la nota de agradecimiento a los participantes en la funcion gimnastico-artistica masiva "Arirang", laureada con el Premio Kim Il Sung.
					La funcion ofrecida con motivo del 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y del 60o del triunfo en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria demostro a todo el mundo el aspecto de desarrollo de cultura y arte de tipo jucheano, la dignidad y poderio de la nacion coreana que avanza a pasos firmes hacia la victoria final glorificando las proezas revolucionarias de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il realizadas por la defensa de la patria y la prosperidad nacional y siguiendo la orientacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					
					Los ejecutante describieron en escenas epicas como musicas, danzas, gimnasias, acrobacias, pizarra humana, etc., la primera centuria de la Corea de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en que llegaron a la cima la dignidad y soberania del pais, y la era de prosperidad guiada por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un que brillara eternamente, infundiendo en todos los militares y civiles coreanos el gran orgullo nacional. 
					
					Tuvo lugar este viernes en el Estadio Primero de Mayo el acto de traslado de la nota de agradamiento con la participacion del secretario del Comite Central del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, y otros funcionarios interesados, asi como los participantes en la funcion "Arirang". 
					
					Kim Ki Nam dio lectura al mensaje de agradecimiento del Mariscal. 
					
					Luego, hubo discursos de juramento.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita dia de independencia de Lesotho
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita dia de independencia de Lesotho
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio este viernes un mensaje de felicitacion al rey de Lesotho, Letsie III, con motivo del 47o aniversario de la independencia de ese pais.
					Convencido de que se desarrollaran mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises, el remitente deseo de todo corazon al destinatario buena salud y felicidad, y a su pueblo,  incesante desarrollo y prosperidad.

articles.title: Departamento de Politica de CDN advierte a la banda de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Departamento de Politica de CDN advierte a la banda de Park Geun-hye
						
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Departamento de Politica del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 4 la siguiente declaracion:
					Lograr cuanto antes la reunificacion, la paz y la prosperidad del pais es la infrenable aspiracion de la nacion y corriente de la epoca.
					
					Todas las medidas magnanimas y pacientes tomadas por nuestro ejercito y pueblo para reabrir la Zona Industrial de Kaesong y reanudar el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados y el turismo al monte Kumgang fueron una expresion de los esfuerzos patrioticos para sujetar lo todo a tal aspiracion nacional y demanda de la epoca.
					
					Como resultado, entraron en la via de recuperacion las relaciones intercoreanas, que se acercaban a la fase catastrofica por culpa del traidor Lee Myung Bak, y comenzo el relajamiento de la extremada tension del pais. 
					
					Hace poco, comenzo la nueva coyuntura de dialogo y cooperacion bajo la profunda atencion y expectativas de nacionales y extranjeros, infundiendo la esperanza en toda la nacion coreana. 
					
					Pero, Park Geun-hye y otros gobernantes actuales del Sur de Corea siguen insistiendo en el "enfrentamiento con dialogo" sin liberarse de la desconfianza y hostilidad y actuan intolerablemente congelando con sus chismes y medidas groseras el ambiente de reconciliacion y cooperacion que se preparaba a duras penas. 
					
					Ahora la banda de Park Geun-hye difunde el rumor de que las medidas protagonicas de la RPDC para la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur se toman "bajo el control" de otro pais grande y son una "opcion inevitable para reabrir la congelada fuente de ingreso y remediar la dificil situacion economica" y "medidas emergentes adoptadas por la dificultad de mantener el regimen". 
					
					Y habla como si el reinicio de la operacion normal de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong y el logro de algunos acuerdos al respecto fueran resultado de la "doctrina de mantenimiento de principios" de Park. 
					
					Nuestro ejercito y pueblo ya han advertido en varias ocasiones que para no repetir el antecedente de 5 anos pasados en las relaciones intercoreanas, las autoridades surcoreanas deben actuar con prudencia para contribuir a la paz y reunificacion del pais sin recurrir a los anacronicos actos verbales contra la parte connacional. 
					
					Tan pronto como tomara el sillon presidencial, Park ofendio abiertamente algun tiempo la dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC. Hasta hace poco, lo hacia entre bastidores y pero ahora vuelve a calumniar publicamente.
					
					Hasta la fecha, Park y sus seguidores vinieron hablando como si estuvieran preocupados de la vida y el futuro de alguien, a saber, "hay que conducir al Norte para que abandone la linea de desarrollo paralelo (de la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares) y opte correctamente por el camino de cambio", "se debe hacer al Norte saber que la ex-URSS fue derrumbada no por la falta de armas nucleares y "es preciso procurar un fuerte disuasivo al Norte para que este renuncie el arma nuclear y el misil".
					
					Al imitar el gran festival politico de la RPDC por el dia de victoria en la guerra, admirado por el mundo entero, ellos celebraron pomposamente el acto por el "dia de fuerzas armadas" y prometen con fanfarroneria que con el insignificante "sistema de operacion conjunta Sur de Corea-Estados Unidos", el "de ataque preventivo tipo Kill Chain", el desgastado "de defensa antimisil de tipo surcoreano", etc., harian al Norte de Corea comprender que no le sirven mas sus armas nucleares y misiles.
					
					Ademas, criticaron hasta las firmas signadas de amor y confianza del Mariscal Kim Jong Un al pie de las cartas de fidelidad que le envian muchos habitantes norcoreanos.
					
					Insatisfechos con censurar la unidad monolitica de la RPDC establecida como lazos fraternales, esos elementos corruptos difamaron la dignidad de la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC con datos fraudulentos tratando de ensombrecer los rayos del sol.
					
					En cuanto a la mala conducta de Park, hasta los ninos de la primera se preguntan: "?No habra otra persona mejor que Park en el Sur de Corea? ?Como ha sido posible que ella se haya elegido presidenta a pesar de su vicio de hablar mal?". 
					
					En tanto, los militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea se burlan de la gobernadora surcoreana senalando que "Es verdad que ella no sabe ni jota de los asuntos militares. Si no fuera asi, conoceria que significan nuestras armas nucleares minimizadas, aligeradas y diversificadas y no hablaria como ahora".
					
					Ahora, nuestro ejercito y pueblo dudan como Park se mantiene en el sillon presidencial, aunque fue sometida a la avalancha de criticas de la epoca como "testaruda" que da espaldas a la opinion publica y se opone a la reconciliacion nacional y como "persona de sangre fria" que desprecia la buena fe de los compatriotas.
					
					Dada la grave situacion en que el ambiente de dialogo, que se preparaba a duras penas en la Peninsula Coreana, vuelve al estado de enfrentamiento y el clima pacifico regresa a la fase de tensiones, el Departamento de Politica del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea advierte severamente a Park Geun-hye y sus compinches como lo siguiente:
					
					Primero, si Park Geun-hye se cree politica, deberia juzgar bien todos los asuntos y hablar razonablemente.
					
					Desde la antiguedad, se dice que la desgracia parte de la boca y esta es la via de transmision de enfermedades.
					
					Debera abstenerse de insistir en el "principio" que no lo es realmente y de imponer su opinion unilateral y egoista como si fuera la "norma internacional".
					
					Debe tener presente que con los improperios se buscara la lluvia de fuego del ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					Como dice el refran, el que habla mal, le cae la desgracia.
					
					Hace falta recordar que los politicos nacidos en esta tierra deben decir palabras, que contribuyan a la reunificacion, la paz y la prosperidad del pais, y en el caso contrario, repetiran el fin tragico del dictador de renovacion y otros ex presidentes titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Segundo, Park Geun-hye y su camarilla tienen que portarse con prudencia viendo correctamente la aspiracion de la nacion y la corriente de la epoca.
					
					La nacion coreana desea la reconciliacion y la cooperacion y la epoca demanda la paz y la reunificacion.
					
					Si quiere vivir como humano verdadero que antepone y da importancia a la nacion, no debe cometer los actos vendepatrias y traidores a la nacion como hostilizar a los connacionales y confabularse con los agresores, siendo fascinado de la cooperacion con las fuerzas foraneas.
					
					La conducta imprudente de hoy como abandonar a la nacion y rechazar la epoca conducira a la senda de peor traicion, de la cual sentenciara la historia.
					
					No debe olvidar que es imperdonable acto traidor el hecho de que amenaza a la connacional RPDC introduciendo a menudo los medios de ataque nuclear de los agresores, incluyendo la flotilla de portaaviones nuclear, y lanza casi diariamente la guerra psicologica anti-RPDC instigando a las escorias humanas a lanzar volantes.
					
					Tercero, Park Geun-hye y su horda no deben atreverse a conducir a alguien al "cambio" ni hacerle deponer las armas nucleares.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC avanzaran invariablemente manteniendo firmemente la linea de desarrollo paralelo para construir un pais prospero, admirado por el mundo, segun su meta propia y por el estilo coreano.
					
					Lo que debe ser cambiado no es la RPDC sino la pseudo-politica de Park que toma el camino de renovacion y dictadura desviandose de la democratizacion.
					
					Las fuerzas armadas nucleares de nuestro ejercito y pueblo son poderoso disuasivo para frenar los desastres de la guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y valiosa herramienta comun de la nacion para defender el destino del pais y los compatriotas.
					
					Tambien son medios pacificos mas apropiados para eliminar completamente la continua amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. y lograr la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana como parte de la misma del mundo entero.
					
					No habria en este mundo un tipo mas imbecil que el que intenta bajar el arma de su casa poniendose al lado del bandido que acomete con el garrote nuclear.
					
					Si Park y su banda intentan el desarme nuclear de la RPDC para derrocar el regimen de esta en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras y bajo el rotulo de inducir el "cambio", eso sera un acto suicida igual a lanzarse al fuego con gasolina.
					
					Ha sido siempre tragico el destino de los que frustraron la aspiracion nacional y desafiaron a la corriente de la epoca.
					
					Park y sus seguidores deben actuar con prudencia viendo correctamente la tendencia de la situacion.

articles.title: Firmado protocolo RPDC-Rusia
articles.content:
Firmado protocolo RPDC-Rusia 
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ACNC) -- Quedo rubricado el dia 4 en esta capital el protocolo de la XVIII reunion de la subcomision de selvicultura de la Comision Intergubernamental para la Cooperacion en Comercio Exterior, Economia, Ciencia y Tecnica entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Federacion Rusa.
					En la ceremonia de firmas, estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana el vicepresidente de la subcomision Kim Yong Jin y otros funcionarios, y por la rusa, los miembros de la delegacion de la misma entidad presidida por su homologo Valery Prilipov.
					
					Kim Yong Jin y Valery Prilipov suscribieron el documento.

articles.title: ACNC critica discurso del gobernante japones en la ONU
articles.content:
ACNC critica discurso del gobernante japones en la ONU
Pyongyang, 4 de octubre (ACNC) -- En el 68o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU, el gobernante japones dijo que "si no hay la solucion del problema de secuestro, tampoco habria la normalizacion de relaciones diplomaticas Japon-Corea" y preconizo la "prevencion de los crimenes de abuso sexual y el apoyo material y espiritual a las victimas".
					Su discurso es una artimana para ocultar la naturaleza de Japon, autor de los crimenes de secuestro y esclavitud sexual, y eludir la liquidacion del pasado.
					
					Desde el principio, el pais isleno no tiene calidad de hablar del "secuestro" y la "violacion sexual".
					
					En el siglo pasado, cometio durante sus agresiones a los paises asiaticos tremendos crimenes de guerra, en particular, el secuestro y la esclavitud sexual.
					
					Japon arresto por la fuerza en Corea a mas de 8 millones 400 mil jovenes y adultos y convirtio a 200 mil coreanas en esclavas sexuales de los uniformados japoneses.  
					
					Los crimenes cometidos por el imperialismo japones son una gran delincuencia que debe pagarse mil veces mayor.
					
					Si Japon tiene el sano juicio, debe reconocer, pedir disculpa e indemnizar ante la sociedad internacional por sus crimenes pasados.
					
					Pero, los reaccionarios japoneses niegan obstinadamente el crimen pasado a fin de realizar sin falta su ambicion de reagresion no cumplida, y trata de politizar su accion descarada.
					
					Debido a las maniobras para derechizar y militarizar toda la sociedad, en este pais isleno se comente a plena luz los malos actos que hacen recordar el secuestro del pasado.
					
					La banda ultraderechista de Japon recurre por doquier del mundo al "trafico de ser humano" y ademas, no vacila en raptar a los habitantes de la RPDC. No se ha cambiado la figura de Japon como pais de crimen antietico.
					
					Tal pais se atreve a hablar del "secuestro" y la "violacion sexual"  en la palestra internacional, lo que es una burla y desafio a la justicia y la conciencia de la humanidad. 
					
					Al cuestionar obstinadamente el "problema de secuestro", Japon trata de disuadir a la RPDC y la sociedad internacional que le urgen la liquidacion del pasado.
					
					El mundo califica el disparate de gobernante japones como "discurso antinomico" y "chisme para descentrar el foco en la liquidacion de pasado".
					
					Seria conveniente al pais isla escuchar las condenas internacionales y dejar de pronunciar palabras hipocritas como "problema de secuestro" y "derechos de la mujer".
					
					Teniendo presente que la liquidacion del pasado es la cuestion fundamental de las relaciones RPDC-Japon, este debe pedir disculpas e indemnizar cuanto antes todos sus crimenes del pasado, inclusive la esclavitud sexual.
